explanation: The stage direction provides a detailed description of the passage of time and the sounds associated with different hours, which gives it a narrative quality. This aligns with the definition of narration, as it is intended for readers to understand the context and setting without dialogue or character interaction.
stgdir: Abois de chiens sur la route... Autos qui passent... Silence. Deux heures, bruits d'autos... Silence. Trois heures... Chants du coq se répandant dans la campagne... Silence. Quatre heures...
